The veteran community was clear: Congress needed to address toxic exposure, and I am proud to have worked with veterans and veteran service organizations across the country to deliver on this promise.

That is why I introduced the Veterans Infertility Treatment Act, which would make infertility care, including in-vitro fertilization, a part of VA health care for veterans struggling with infertility without having to prove service-connection like toxic exposure.
